column4: just wondering...xp/vista has the remote desktop thing...does ubuntu have something like that?
just wondering, i got 3 partitions on my Hdd, 2 primaries and 1 logical...the logical partition being FAT32 formatted...is it possible to install ubuntu on the 3rd partition?
fdisk that partition to linux and install upon it
I'm pretty sure FAT32 isn't going to fly for the installation...I *could* be wrong
